resources.string: click the next button to learn about some apes!
Click on an image below to learn more about an ape!

My name is Jalynn Hicks, I am the developer and the founder of ApeState. My mission is to bring educational information on all sorts of great apes since theyâ€™re mostly related to us more than other organism and species in the world. You would be very surprised how many similarities we share with our closest cousins.
This app is for educational purposes only and information provided in this app are from educational resources. All rights reserved.
Thank you for using my app, ApeState!
